vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.23.37
§ Naharai = "snorter"
one of David's mighty warriors and the armour bearer of Joab
vocabInfos._es_Definition: guerrero; portador de las armas (escudero) de Joab; en tiempos del rey David
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
拿哈萊
1) 大衛王的大能勇士之一, 負責給約押拿兵器
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
拿哈莱
1) 大卫王的大能勇士之一, 负责给约押拿兵器
